string.text: the Dogs will no longer interfere with the stalkers to go through the Wild Territory. Now the output can take any group.

to Destroy all airborne units of the military at Chernobyl
the Military operation failed "Monolith" thanks to you. You destroyed units: Quartet, Falcon, Vulture, Falcon, Owl, Harrier, Hawk, Kite, Kestrel.
